titleStmt.title: The pryncyples of astronamye the whiche diligently perscrutyd is in maners pronosticacyon to the worldes end compyled by andrew Boorde of phisick Doctor
titleStmt.author: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549.

publicationStmt.publisher: In [the] fletestrete at the sygne of the rose garland by Robert Coplande,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
